title: New Soraka E bug
body: I was playing a bot game and Ashe was standing in my E long enough to get snared but then it looked like she couldn't move because she was teleporting back and fourth from where she was snared to where she was trying to to walk and then i killed her.

replies.body: I figure I will put this here since a red has responded. Not a bug per se, but Soraka's Starcall heals herself when it lands on a champion. There is no information about it in the tooltip. Is it a fix percentage of the damage?
